entry.title: Had a great game with my friends early morning, despite the heat. Staying fit helps us embrace ageing ‚Äî You‚Äôre never too old to live your best life! What is your favourite way to get your weekly dose of exercise? #fitness #fitnessmotivation #healthy #well

entry.title: I have learned we must search for peace within ourselves, all the great religions teach us this. Meditation helped me look past the illusion of power and control. Going within ourselves, helps us see our oneness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #meditat
entry.content: I have learned we must search for peace within ourselves, all the great religions teach us this. Meditation helped me look past the illusion of power and control. Going within ourselves, helps us see our oneness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #meditation #lifehacks

entry.title: Meditation helped me and my late wife when she was dying of cancer to stay calm and peaceful in the face of extreme stress. While undergoing treatment, she remained cheerful in her final days. Our 15 year practice of meditation prepared us to be at peace
entry.content: Meditation helped me and my late wife when she was dying of cancer to stay calm and peaceful in the face of extreme stress. While undergoing treatment, she remained cheerful in her final days. Our 15 year practice of meditation prepared us to be at peace in the face of difficulty and extreme adversity. After her passing, meditation helped me cope with my sadness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #cancer #cancerawareness

entry.content: Sybil made us one of her childhood favourites today ‚Äî Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich! Even though I told her the taste was ‚Äòok‚Äô, I was smiling widely. I am blessed to be able to share these moments with her. This is a reminder to tell your loved ones you appreciate them ‚ù§Ô∏è #breakfast #family #couplegoals #couple #peanutbutter

entry.title: Last week I met some of my young friends, I listened as they shared their views on what common stressors and causes of anxiety are today. I shared my idea for a short meditation series and they encouraged me to start filming. Please stay tuned! #mentalhea

entry.title: Today I started to record my meditation series. Meditation has helped me tremendously in my life. Looking forward to share this life skill with all of you! #mentalhealth #meditation #mentalhealthmatters #lifehacks #lifetips

entry.title: I shared my secret to staying healthy at 75, ‚ÄòSHIELD‚Äô. This acronym was coined by Dr Rudolph Tanzi who specialises in Alzheimer‚Äôs and neurology. It is heartening that so many of you guys have picked up on my version of it and helped spread this life-savin
entry.content: I shared my secret to staying healthy at 75, ‚ÄòSHIELD‚Äô. This acronym was coined by Dr Rudolph Tanzi who specialises in Alzheimer‚Äôs and neurology. It is heartening that so many of you guys have picked up on my version of it and helped spread this life-saving message. When I came to know that Dr. Rudolph Tanzi is on the Scientific Board for Chromadex, it stimulated my interest in his work. He has been a leader in Alzheimer‚Äôs research for decades . I started reading up on some of his books , ‚ÄúThe Super Brain‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe Healing Self‚Äù, where I came across the wonderful acronym Dr. Tanzi used for healthy lifestyle especially when one is aging - S.H.I.E.L.D. When I had the opportunity to speak with Dr. Tanzi via zoom, I wanted to know how he came up with his acronym. Here is a sneak peek of the conversation. I hope that we continue to spread positive messages like this, so that we can keep the online space a truly beneficial one for all ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: Max and I would like to wish you a very good morning and a cheerful start to your day! What are your weekend plans? #britishshorthair #mentalhealthmatters #peace #motivation #morningroutine
